## Load required libraries and functions
```{r}
source(paste0(params$codedir, "/busco596/functions.R"))

library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
# install.packages("log4r")
# install.packages("seqinr")

# store initial system time
sys_tic <- Sys.time()

# create outdir
currentdir <- paste0(params$outdir, "/")
if (!dir.exists(currentdir)) {
  dir.create(currentdir, recursive = T)
}

# create log file
fn_log <- paste0(params$outdir, "/extract_ref_busco.log")
log_appender <- log4r::file_appender(fn_log, append = TRUE, layout = log4r::default_log_layout())
fn_logger <- log4r::logger(threshold = "INFO", appenders = log_appender)
if (params$redo) {
  unlink(fn_log)
  write.table(c("SimNOW (Simulation Non-Overlapping Windows)",
                "Developed by Jeremias Ivan"),
              file=fn_log, quote=F, row.names=F, col.names=F)
}

knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = currentdir)
```

```{r}
# extract list of references
ls_refseq <- list.dirs(params$dir_busco_refseq, recursive=F, full.names=F)
ls_eucalyptus <- ls_refseq[grepl("^E_",ls_refseq)]
ls_non_eucalyptus <- ls_refseq[!ls_refseq%in%ls_eucalyptus]

# extract BUSCO for non-Eucalyptus
dir_output_non_eucalyptus <- paste0(getwd(), "/non_eucalyptus/")
ls_busco_non_eucalyptus <- f_extract_busco(ls_non_eucalyptus, params$dir_busco_refseq, params$busco_lineage, dir_output_non_eucalyptus)
f_check_busco(1, 0.05, dir_output_non_eucalyptus, params$thread)

# extract BUSCO for Eucalyptus
dir_output_eucalyptus <- paste0(getwd(), "/eucalyptus/")
ls_busco_eucalyptus <- f_extract_busco(ls_eucalyptus, params$dir_busco_refseq, params$busco_lineage, dir_output_eucalyptus)
f_check_busco(length(ls_eucalyptus)/2, 0.05, dir_output_eucalyptus, params$thread)
```
